data.title: Inaugural Session
data.detail:
- Welcome Address by Dr Sangita Reddy, President, FICCI 
 - Keynote Address by Mr Rashesh Shah, Past President, FICCI and Chairman & CEO, Edelweiss Group
- Theme Address by Mr Sunil Sanghai, Chairman, FICCI National Committee on Capital Markets and Founder & CEO, NovaDhruva Capital Pvt. Ltd.
- Exchange Perspective by Mr Ashishkumar Chauhan, Managing Director & CEO, BSE
- Release of FICCI’s Experts’ Voice 2020 & FICCI-IIM Ahmedabad Report : Women on Boards in India
- Inaugural Address by Mr Ajay Tyagi, Chairman, Securities and Exchange Board of India 
- Concluding Remarks by Mr Himanshu Kaji, Co-chair, FICCI Capital Markets Committee and Executive Director & Group COO, Edelweiss Financial Services Limited 
- Session moderated by Ms. Jyoti Vij, Deputy Secretary General, FICCI
data.label: MORNING

data.title: Special Session with Chief Economic Adviser
data.detail:
- Introduction by Mr Sunil Sanghai, Chairman, FICCI National Committee on Capital Markets 
- Special Address by Dr Krishnamurthy Subramanian, Chief Economic Adviser, Government of India 
- Concluding Remarks by Mr Dilip Chenoy, Secretary General, FICCI
data.label: MORNING

data.title: Session on Social Stock Exchange
data.detail:
- Introduction by Mr Sunil Sanghai, Chairman, FICCI National Committee on Capital Markets
- Presentation on Social Stock Exchange by Mr Amarjeet Singh, Executive Director, Securities and Exchange Board of India 
- Session Moderation and Vote of Thanks by Mrs Vidya Shah*, CEO, EdelGive Foundation
data.label: MORNING

data.title: Session on Infrastructure Financing
data.detail:
Introduction by Mr Sunil Sanghai, Chairman, FICCI National Committee on Capital Markets
 Address by Mr Sujit Prasad, Executive Director, Securities and Exchange Board of India Panelists 
 • Mr Nikhil Naredi, Partner, Shardul Amarchand Mangaldas & Co 
 • Mr Harsh Shah, CEO, IndiGrid - Sterlite Investment Managers Ltd
data.label: AFTERNOON

data.title: Special Session with Secretary
data.detail:
Introduction by Mr Sunil Sanghai, Chairman, FICCI National Committee on Capital Markets
 Address by Mr Sujit Prasad, Executive Director, Securities and Exchange Board of India Panelists 
 • Mr Nikhil Naredi, Partner, Shardul Amarchand Mangaldas & Co 
 • Mr Harsh Shah, CEO, IndiGrid - Sterlite Investment Managers Ltd
data.label: AFTERNOON

data.title: Presentation on FICCI IIM Ahmedabad Report
data.detail:
Introduction by Ms Jyoti Vij, Deputy Secretary General, FICCI 
 Presentation by Dr Neharika Vohra, Professor, IIM Ahmedabad
data.label: AFTERNOON

data.title: Special Session with Mr G Mahalingam
data.detail:
Introduction and Session Moderation by Mr Vijay Chandok, Co- Chair, FICCI National Committee on Capital Markets and Managing Director & CEO, ICICI Securities Limited 
 Special Address by Mr G Mahalingam, Whole Time Member, SEBI  
 Concluding Remarks by FICCI
data.label: MORNING

data.title: Special Plenary Session with Secretary
data.detail:
Introduction by Mr Sunil Sanghai, Chairman, FICCI National Committee on Capital Markets 
 Keynote Address by Mr Tarun Bajaj, Secretary, Department of Economic Affairs, Ministry of Finance 
 Session moderation by Mr Shardul Shroff, Chairman, FICCI Committee on Stressed Assets and Executive Chairman, Shardul Amarchand Mangaldas & Co. 
 Vote of Thanks by Mr Dilip Chenoy, Secretary General, FICCI
data.label: MORNING

data.title: Session on Robust Debt Market
data.detail:
Session Keynote by Mr Ananta Barua, Whole Time Member, SEBI 
 Panellists: 
• Mr Vijay Chandok, Co- Chair, FICCI National Committee on Capital Markets  
• Mr Nilesh Shah, MD, Kotak Mahindra Asset Management Co. Ltd. 
• Mr R Govindan, Executive Vice President – Corporate Finance & Chief Risk Officer, Larsen & Toubro Ltd. 
• Mr Samar Banwat, Executive Director, NSDL 
• Mr Jujhar Singh, Managing Director, Global Head-Financial Markets India, Standard Chartered Bank
data.label: MORNING

data.title: Session on Channelizing Foreign
data.detail:
Session Keynote by Mr K Rajaraman, Additional Secretary (Investment & IER), Department of Economic Affairs, Ministry of Finance 
Panellists: 
• Mr Sujoy Bose, Managing Director & CEO, National Investment and Infrastructure Fund (NIIF) 
• Mr Mark Austen, CEO, Asia Securities Industry & Financial Markets Association (ASIFMA)  
• Mr Saurabh Agarwal, Managing Director, Infrastructure, South Asia, CDPQ 
• Ms Renuka Ramnath *, Founder & CEO, Multiples Asset Management Ltd
data.label: AFTERNOON

data.title: Session on Digitisation in Governance
data.detail:
Introduction by Dr Sangita Reddy, President, FICCI 
Setting the Theme by Mr Sunil Sanghai, Chairman, FICCI National Committee on Capital Markets 
Keynote Address by Mr Ajay Bhushan Pandey, Finance Secretary, Ministry of Finance 
Concluding Remarks by Mr Dilip Chenoy, Secretary General, FICCI
data.label: AFTERNOON
